DriverRegistrationPage.description: Earn up to 1901 zł per week by driving with BoltCopy
DriverRegistrationPage.secondaryDescription: Become a BoltCopy driver, set your schedule and earn money by driving!

DriverRegistrationPageHeadSection.title: Join BoltCopy as a driver – earn whenever you want
DriverRegistrationPageHeadSection.description: Become a driver with BoltCopy and start earning! Flexible working hours, attractive earnings, easy registration. Apply now and drive on your own terms!
DriverRegistrationPageHeadSection.keywords: driver jobs, earning as a driver, transport app, join as a driver, flexible work, full-time driver jobs, part-time driver jobs, driver recruitment

DriverRegistrationForm.termsText: By registering, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy policy, commit to comply with obligations under the European Union and local legislation and provide only legal services and content on the BoltCopy Platform.
DriverRegistrationForm.initialRegistrationSuccess: Registration was successful! Check your email.

FormErrors.requiredPhoneNumber: Providing the phone number is required
FormErrors.passwordMinimumCharacters: Password must contain at least 8 characters
FormErrors.passwordUpperCase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
FormErrors.passwordLowerCase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
FormErrors.passwordDigit: Password must contain at least one digit
FormErrors.passwordSpecialCharacter: Password must contain at least one special character
FormErrors.passwordMustMatch: The entered passwords do not match
FormErrors.requiredVehicleRegistrationNumber: Providing the vehicle registration number is required
FormErrors.vehicleRegistrationMinimumCharacters: The vehicle registration number must contain at least 4 characters
FormErrors.vehicleRegistrationCharacters: The vehicle registration number can contain only uppercase letters and digits

DriverRegistrationCompletePage.description: Turn the key to adventure and profits with BoltCopy
DriverRegistrationCompletePage.secondaryDescription: Join the ranks of satisfied BoltCopy drivers! Choose work hours that suit you and earn money by meeting travelers needs!

DriverRegistrationCompletePageHeadSectio.title: The final step to earning with BoltCopy!
DriverRegistrationCompletePageHeadSectio.description: Complete your registration and start your adventure as a BoltCopy driver. We offer flexibility, great earnings, and ease of managing your own time. Don't delay, start today!
DriverRegistrationCompletePageHeadSectio.keywords: driver earnings, independent work, earning app, becoming a driver, work with flexible schedule, driver work on your own terms, completion of registration, earning by driving

DriverCompleteRegistrationForm.header: Complete the registration to become a Bolt driver
